title: Lyft to add autonomous shuttles in 2026 as Uber inks more self-driving deals
description: It's one of just a few similar partnerships Lyft has struck, while rival Uber has an increasingly long list of robotaxi deals.
summary: Lyft计划于2026年推出自动驾驶穿梭巴士服务，这标志着其在自动驾驶领域的进一步布局。与此同时，竞争对手Uber正在不断扩大其自动驾驶出租车的合作伙伴名单。

title: Tesla is reportedly bringing a limited version of its robotaxi service to San Francisco
description: There will be an employee in the driver's seat -- a big change from how things have been working in Austin.
summary: 特斯拉计划在旧金山推出其机器人出租车服务的限量版，与奥斯汀的运营模式不同，此次将有员工坐在驾驶座上。这一变化可能是为了适应当地的监管要求或测试需要。

title: Apple broadens App Store’s age-rating system
description: Apple has expanded its age-rating system to include 13+, 16+, and 18+ ratings, in addition to the existing ratings for younger users.
summary: 苹果公司扩展了其App Store的年龄评级系统，新增了13+、16+和18+的评级选项，以更好地适应不同年龄段用户的需求。这一变化旨在为用户提供更精确的内容过滤和应用推荐。

title: Tesla is reportedly behind on its pledge to build 5,000 Optimus bots this year
description: Tesla is behind on its goal to produce at least 5,000 Optimus humanoid robots by the end of 2025.
summary: 特斯拉未能如期实现其2025年底前生产至少5000台Optimus人形机器人的目标。这一延迟可能影响公司在机器人领域的竞争力和市场预期。

title: Meta to stop selling political ads in the EU from October
description: In response to the European Union's incoming regulation of political advertising, Meta said on Friday that it would stop selling and showing political ads in the EU from October 2025.
summary: Meta宣布将从2025年10月起停止在欧盟销售和展示政治广告，此举是为了应对欧盟即将实施的政治广告监管规定。该决定可能对Meta在欧洲的广告业务产生重大影响。

title: Google is testing a vibe-coding app called Opal
description: Google is testing a new vibe-coding tool called Opal, available in the U.S. through Google Labs, that lets users quickly spin up web apps with just a few prompts.
summary: 谷歌正在测试一款名为Opal的新工具，通过Google Labs在美国推出。Opal是一种"氛围编码"应用，用户只需输入几个提示即可快速创建网页应用程序。

title: Amid increased momentum for defense, the NATO Innovation Fund refreshes its investment team
description: The NATO Innovation Fund (NIF) is entering a new chapter, marked by the arrival of two new partners and the departure of its penultimate founding team partner.
summary: 北约创新基金（NIF）迎来新发展阶段，两位新合伙人加入，同时其倒数第二位创始团队合伙人离职。这一变化反映了基金在国防领域投资的加速步伐。

title: How to make your iPhone homescreen icons clear using iOS 26
description: Back in 2024, we described how the then-new iOS 18 enabled you to tint your homescreen icons, allowing you to tweak the look of your iPhone's display. Now, with Apple's introduction of its Liquid Glas
summary: 苹果在iOS 26中引入了Liquid Glass功能，使用户可以让iPhone主屏幕图标更加清晰。这项新功能继iOS 18的图标着色功能后，进一步提升了用户自定义手机界面的能力。

title: Taste testing battery-flavored tortilla chips
description: I get a lot of odd pitches in my inbox, but “9V battery-flavored corn chips” still stopped me in my tracks. My mind was ringing with questions (What? Who? Why!?!), but most importantly: What are they
summary: 一款以9伏电池味道为灵感的玉米片引发了人们的好奇。这款产品的出现引发了关于其创意来源和市场需求的讨论，成为近期科技界的热门话题。

title: Breaking down Trump’s big gift to the AI industry
description: President Donald Trump's plan to promote America's AI dominance involves discouraging "woke AI," slashing state and federal regulations, and laying the groundwork to rapidly expand AI development and
summary: 美国前总统特朗普计划通过减少州和联邦监管、反对“觉醒AI”，以及为快速扩展AI开发奠定基础，以促进美国在人工智能领域的主导地位。这一计划旨在推动AI技术的快速发展。

title: Asus’ slim ROG G14 gaming laptop with an RTX 5070 Ti is $350 off
description: The Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 has long been a Verge-favorite gaming laptop, and we consider it to be the very best one that you can buy. This year, the lineup became even more powerful and spec-packed whi
summary: 华硕的ROG Zephyrus G14游戏笔记本电脑以其强大的性能和丰富的配置一直备受好评。现在，这款搭载RTX 5070 Ti显卡的轻薄笔记本电脑正在进行促销，价格下调了350美元。

title: Microsoft’s AI CEO thinks Copilot will age and ‘have a room that it lives in’
description: Mustafa Suleyman, Microsoft’s AI CEO, has a vision of Copilot that involves it being so highly personalized that “it will age.” Microsoft has been increasingly pushing Copilot to be a personalized AI
summary: 微软AI负责人穆斯塔法·苏莱曼设想未来的Copilot将高度个性化，甚至会“随着时间推移而成长”。微软正致力于将Copilot打造成一个个性化的AI助手，以满足用户的长期需求。

title: Diving into Apple’s Liquid Glass
description: Apple has had two months to refine Liquid Glass since introducing the design language at WWDC. It's dialed the effect back, then amped it back up. It's addressed some of the biggest complaints - the C
summary: 苹果在WWDC上推出Liquid Glass设计语言后，经过两个月的调整，已经对其效果进行了多次优化。苹果解决了一些主要的用户反馈问题，进一步完善了这一设计语言。

title: Trump’s Anti-Bias AI Order Is Just More Bias
description: The Trump administration says it wants AI models free from ideological bias, as it pressures their developers to reflect the president’s worldview.
summary: 特朗普政府要求人工智能模型消除意识形态偏见，同时施压开发者使其反映总统的世界观。这一命令引发了对AI技术中立性和开发者自主性的担忧。

title: The Best Samsung Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
description: From flagship and budget to flipping and folding, Samsung’s Galaxy range spans the breadth of the smartphone cosmos. WIRED’s here to help you make your choice.
summary: WIRED对2025年三星Galaxy系列手机进行了测试和评测，涵盖从旗舰机型到折叠屏手机的多种选择，帮助消费者找到最适合自己的三星手机。文章详细分析了各款手机的性能和特点。

title: Somnee Smart Sleep Headband Review: High-Tech Help
description: This wearable tech maps your brain using EEG sensors and algorithms, delivering therapeutic stimulation to improve sleep. And it succeeds, sort of.
summary: Somnee智能睡眠头带通过EEG传感器和算法监测大脑活动，并提供治疗性刺激以改善睡眠质量。虽然效果并不完美，但在一定程度上取得了成功。

title: Samsung Galaxy Watch8 and Watch8 Classic Review: The Squircle
description: Samsung introduces a ton of new health-tracking features, some of which are a little strange.
summary: 三星推出了Galaxy Watch8和Watch8 Classic，这两款智能手表引入了大量新的健康追踪功能，其中一些功能较为新奇。这些新功能旨在提升用户的健康管理体验。

title: 5 Best Red-Light Therapy Masks and LED Devices of 2025, Reviewed
description: Your face called, and it’s low-key offended you might trust TikTok more than WIRED.
summary: WIRED评测了2025年最好的五款红光治疗面罩和LED设备，帮助消费者在众多产品中做出明智选择。文章强调了这些设备的功效和使用体验，并提醒消费者不要盲目跟随社交媒体上的推荐。

title: The First Planned Migration of an Entire Country Is Underway
description: The Pacific island nation of Tuvalu could be submerged in 25 years due to rising sea levels, so a plan is being implemented to relocate its population to Australia.
summary: 由于海平面上升，太平洋岛国图瓦卢可能在25年内被淹没。为此，该国正在实施一项计划，将其人口迁移到澳大利亚，以应对这一环境危机。

title: It’s Qwen’s summer: new open source Qwen3-235B-A22B-Thinking-2507 tops OpenAI, Gemini reasoning models on key benchmarks
description: The new Qwen3-Thinking-2507, as we'll call it for short, now leads or closely trails top-performing models across several major benchmarks.
summary: 新推出的开源模型Qwen3-Thinking-2507在多个重要基准测试中表现出色，超越或紧随OpenAI和Gemini的推理模型。该模型在性能上取得了显著进步，成为当前顶尖的人工智能模型之一。

title: Brave and AdGuard now block Microsoft Recall by default
source: RSS - Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
description: The Brave web browser and the ad-blocker AdGuard
summary: Brave浏览器和广告拦截器AdGuard现已默认屏蔽微软的Recall服务。这一举措旨在增强用户隐私保护，防止未经同意的数据收集行为。此更新可能对用户的浏览体验和隐私安全产生积极影响。

title: Engadget Podcast: A taste of iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS 26 and more
source: RSS - Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
description: We’ve been playing around with the deve
summary: Engadget播客探讨了苹果最新发布的iOS 26、iPadOS 26和macOS 26的开发者测试版。这些新系统引入了多项功能改进，提升了用户体验，现已开放给公众测试。

title: New Jersey is the latest state to embrace digital IDs
source: RSS - Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
description: New Jersey citizens will now be able to flash their driver's license from their smartphones after Gove
summary: 新泽西州成为最新一个接受数字身份证的州，居民现在可以通过智能手机展示他们的驾照。这一举措将便利居民的日常生活，并推动数字化身份验证的发展。

title: Google invests in carbon dioxide battery for renewable energy storage
source: RSS - Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
description: Google has announced that it has signed a global commercial partnership with Milan-based startup Ener
summary: 谷歌宣布与米兰初创公司Ener签署全球商业合作协议，投资于二氧化碳电池技术，以用于可再生能源的储存。此举旨在提高可再生能源的储存效率，推动可持续发展。

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 review: More screen, more battery but something's missing
source: RSS - Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
description: Samsung’s annual foldable refresh includes a trio of devices this year. While the
summary: 三星发布了年度折叠屏手机新品Galaxy Z Flip 7，升级了屏幕和电池容量。然而，尽管硬件有所提升，用户仍感到某些功能缺失。该设备是三星今年推出的三款折叠设备之一。

title: CRISPR can stop malaria spread by editing a single gene in mosquitos
source: RSS - Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
description: CRISPR gene-editing therapy has shown great potential to treat and even
summary: 科学家利用CRISPR基因编辑技术，通过修改蚊子体内的一个基因，有效阻止了疟疾的传播。这项研究展示了基因编辑在公共卫生领域的巨大潜力，可能为疟疾等传染病的防治提供新途径。

title: How to buy the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Watch 8 series
source: RSS - Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
description: The third Samsung Galaxy Un
summary: 三星发布了最新的Galaxy Z Fold 7、Z Flip 7和Galaxy Watch 8系列产品。消费者可以通过三星官方网站和各大零售商购买这些新款设备。新产品在设计和功能上都有所升级，旨在提升用户体验。

title: Galaxy Watch 8 review: Samsung’s best smartwatch in years
source: RSS - Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
description: I’m too tired to write this review. Last week, I penned a work-in-progress version because I hadn’t yet spent enough time to fully explore the new features Samsung packed into the
summary: 三星推出的Galaxy Watch 8被评为近年来最佳智能手表。评测指出，这款手表在功能和性能上有显著提升，成为市场上值得关注的产品。

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 review: Foldable phone nirvana (for a price)
source: RSS - Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
description: After several generations of iterative updates, it feels like Samsung tossed the Galaxy Z Fold 7 into a Hyperbolic Time Chamber to create a stunning device that's leaner, stronger and more powerful
summary: 三星推出的Galaxy Z Fold 7经过多代更新，成为一款更轻薄、更坚固且更强大的折叠手机。尽管价格不菲，但其创新设计和性能提升让用户体验达到了新的高度。

title: The Morning After: Apple’s iOS 26 beta is ready for the public
source: RSS - Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
description: A few months since WWDC 2025, and Apple is shifting its OS update from developers to brave members of the public. Yesterday, the company launched the public beta version of all its operating system
summary: 苹果公司在2025年全球开发者大会几个月后，正式向公众推出其操作系统的iOS 26公测版。这意味着更多用户可以提前体验最新的系统更新功能。

title: The 5 best Mint alternatives to replace the budgeting app that shut down
source: RSS - Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
description: As a long-time Mint user, I was frustrated to say the least when news broke at the end of 2023 that Intuit would
summary: 由于Intuit宣布关闭其受欢迎的免费预算应用Mint，许多用户感到失望。为了帮助用户寻找替代方案，文章推荐了五款可以替代Mint的预算管理应用。
